WRITING.TITLE: Can I use a family members powerup rewards pro account when I order something offline?
WRITING.TEXT: Just asking because when I put in the number for his card on my account, it still showed the 10% discount.

I was thinking about ordering online, because it is free shipping on orders over $35, the coupon code CAG16 which saves 16%, powerup rewards saving another 10%, and the fact that half of the games I want aren't in my local store(the half that is are my local store come with the original cases, so if I buy online I might be get a sham case).

Depends on where you look, Walmart, Best Buy, and Target offer really good sales from time to time. Best Buy had Battlfront Ultimate Edition right after it came out for $20 on Black Friday, It was $30 on PC. Some people may bring up shadier sites like G2A, but I have gotten insane deals at my local Pawn Shop(something you can't do on PC) and the clearance sales at Walmart.

WRITING.TITLE: Any way to fix scan lines when using component cables on a "Polaroid TLA-01901C tv"?
WRITING.TEXT: When any of my consoles are plugged in to a "Polaroid TLA-01901C TV" using component cables it will create scan lines. I have tried my Xbox original, PS2, and Wii, and their are no scan lines when using just the regular av cables or hdmi. I have tried all of these consoles on other TVs and they work fine with no scan lines.
